vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.47;
son of Caleb (H3612H) and Jahdai (H3056);
brother of: Regem (H7276), Jotham (H3147I), Pelet (H6404), Ephah (H5891I) and Shaaph (H8174)
§ Geshan = "lump"
one of the sons of Jahdai, in the genealogy of Judah, in the family of Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基珊 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "塊狀"
雅代兒子之一, 在猶大的家譜中, 屬迦勒家 (代上2:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基珊 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "块状"
雅代儿子之一, 在犹大的家谱中, 属迦勒家 (代上2:17)
